metadata.description: FEAR ITSELF TIE-IN! As terror grips the planet, an extreme faction of the mutant hate group The Purifiers believes that the end of the world has come and it is up to them to "save" as many human souls as they can before the devil strikes. Can X-Force stop their drive for worldwide suicide? And what, exactly, is a mutant kill crew afraid of?
metadata.name: Fear Itself: Uncanny X-Force
